url: pfsrd://NPC Codex/Rules/Core Class NPCs/Rogue/Rogues/Cave Stalker/Galeth Redbeard

sections.body: Galeth is dour, even for a dwarf, and rarely speaks unless questioned.
Galeth might be a solitary hunter, the lead member of an underground army, or part of a unit of guards wielding crossbows.
Galeth could be discovered barely alive, stuck in a dungeon trap.

name: Galeth Redbeard
